text:
Hi, @misja,
I'm in progress with new commands.
Implementing them should not take long but the most complicated part is the tests.
Anyway, I've created [branch](https://github.com/aio-libs/aioredis/tree/commands_3.0) where the work is being done and PRs are welcome.
